thread.title: Yorkshire Ripper JUMPS 15-month cataract op waiting list
thread.title_full: Yorkshire Ripper JUMPS 15-month cataract op waiting list

title: Yorkshire Ripper JUMPS 15-month cataract op waiting list
text: comments The Yorkshire Ripper has jumped a 15-month NHS waiting queue for a cataract operation. Peter Sutcliffe is currently serving 20 life sentences for mass killings but this has not stopped him receiving a taxpayer funded operation even though some people are waiting more than a year for the same surgery. Peter Sutcliffe has jumped a long queue of up to 15 months to have cataract surgery paid for by the taxpayer According to the Sun , the killer was chained to five guards as he was taken from HMP Frankland to Sunderland Eye Infirmary at the end of January.
